item.ly: \clef bass \time 5/8 \key sib \minor do4\(\p\< sib8 solb[ fa \clef alto | mi(\> sol)\! sib] reb ~ reb\) | do'4-^ sib4.
<< {sol'4 do2 si4} \\ {mi,2 re} >> | < do mi sol >1
